'''Orobashi's Legacy''' is a [[World Quest]] Series in [[Inazuma]].

==Quests==
It is split into six parts:
*[[Orobashi's Legacy: Prologue]]
*[[Orobashi's Legacy: Part I]]
*[[Orobashi's Legacy: Part II]]
*[[Orobashi's Legacy: Part III]]
*[[Orobashi's Legacy: Part IV]]
*[[Orobashi's Legacy: Part V]]

Completing each part will clear up the [[Tatarigami]] in its respective area.

Completing Part III will enable access to the [[Formation Estate]] domain.

Completing [[Orobashi's Legacy: Part V]] will reward the [[diagram]] for the [[Kitain Cross Spear]].
